alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 1:57AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, northeastern Alachua, northwestern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 156 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Orange Heights, or near Keystone Heights, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Keystone Heights, Melrose, East Palatka, George`s Lake, Lake Geneva, Florahome, Bostwick, Melrose Landing and Orange Heights. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
